intent_atoms.description: Recognize senc, saio, and saiz boxes during fragment parsing so the pipeline records their offsets/sizes and surfaces presence to CLI/UI consumers without attempting decryption.
Child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges; overlapping payloads are flagged for CLI/UI surfaces.
Codec configuration validator enforces lengthSizeMinusOne, parameter-set counts, and NAL array integrity across ISOInspectorKit.
Advisory validator warns when ftyp or moov appear in atypical top-level sequences while keeping streaming layouts non-blocking.
Secure licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG-H fixtures so synthetic payloads can be replaced and regression baselines refreshed once approvals land.

functional_units.name: Sample Encryption Placeholder Parsing
functional_units.description: Recognizes senc, saio, and saiz boxes during fragment parsing, records their offsets/sizes, and surfaces presence to CLI/UI without attempting decryption.

functional_units.name: Enforce Parent Containment and Non-Overlap Validation
functional_units.description: Validates that child boxes do not exceed parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Verify avcC/hvcC Invariants Validator
functional_units.description: Ensures codec configuration entries have correct lengthSizeMinusOne, parameter-set counts, and NAL array integrity, surfacing errors in CLI and JSON.

functional_units.name: Warn on Unusual Top-Level Ordering Advisory
functional_units.description: Issues warnings when ftyp or moov appear in atypical top-level sequences while maintaining non-blocking streaming layouts.
